name: Keepface Global, Inc.
description: Developer of an influencer marketing platform designed to help brands collaborate with influencers to boost marketing return on investment in emerging markets. The company's platform facilitates brands to reach out to the most relevant influencers, communicate with them and manage campaigns using real-time analytics, enabling businesses and organizations to influence the minds of targeted prospects using top opinion leaders.
one_liner: Developer of an influencer marketing platform designed to help brands collaborate with influencers to boost marketing return on investment in emerging markets. The company's platform facilitates brands to reach out to the most relevant influencers, communicate with them and manage campaigns using real-time analytics, enabling businesses and organizations to influence the minds of targeted prospects using top opinion leaders.
